Android Framework

Android Framework (AF) is the full collection of Android API, Modules and entry-point required for a Game to port an iOS application to Android. The exposure comes 100% through C++, and completly eliminates the need for Java code at game-side level. The Android Framework repository also comes with a complete set of tools for building an android project.

More information can be found on the Gameloft Docs.
